buildCommand: mkdir -p public && cp docs/*.html docs/*.css public/ 2>/dev/null || true && mkdir -p public/assets && cp -r docs/assets/* public/assets/ 2>/dev/null || true && mkdir -p public/pitch-deck/output public/pitch-deck/themes && cp docs/pitch-deck/output/*.html public/pitch-deck/output/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r docs/pitch-deck/themes public/pitch-deck/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r docs/pitch-deck/assets public/pitch-deck/ 2>/dev/null || true
installCommand: rm -f pnpm-lock.yaml package-lock.json yarn.lock && echo 'No installation required'
